languages.text: {n}Из {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокса{/g} доносится шелест.{/n} "Изгоните недостойных от алтаря прочь, технобратья, ибо Шестой параграф безопасности гласит: "Да пребудет Знание взаперти от несведущих". Средь темных умов не должно звучать проповеди моей".

traits.locale_text: {n}Из {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокса{/g} доносится шелест.{/n} "Изгоните недостойных от алтаря прочь, технобратья, ибо Шестой параграф безопасности гласит: "Да пребудет Знание взаперти от несведущих". Средь темных умов не должно звучать проповеди моей".

languages.text: {n}A rustle comes from the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n} "Drive the unworthy away from the altar, tech-brethren, for it is said in the Sixth Article of Security, 'Let Knowledge be locked away from the ignorant.' The words of my sermon must not reach dark minds."

{n}A rustle comes from the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n} "Drive the unworthy away from the altar, tech-brethren, for it is said in the Sixth Article of Security, 'Let Knowledge be locked away from the ignorant.' The words of my sermon must not reach dark minds."

languages.text: {n}Ein Rascheln ertönt aus dem {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox{/g}.{/n} "Treibt die Unwürdigen fort vom Altar, Techbrüder, denn im Sechsten Satz der Sicherheit heißt es: 'Sperrt das Wissen fort, auf dass die Ignoranten es nicht erlangen können.' Die Worte meiner Predigt dürfen keinen dunklen Verstand erreichen."
languages.original_text: {n}A rustle comes from the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n} "Drive the unworthy away from the altar, tech-brethren, for it is said in the Sixth Article of Security, 'Let Knowledge be locked away from the ignorant.' The words of my sermon must not reach dark minds."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein Rascheln ertönt aus dem {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox{/g}.{/n} "Treibt die Unwürdigen fort vom Altar, Techbrüder, denn im Sechsten Satz der Sicherheit heißt es: 'Sperrt das Wissen fort, auf dass die Ignoranten es nicht erlangen können.' Die Worte meiner Predigt dürfen keinen dunklen Verstand erreichen."

languages.text: {n}Un bruissement sort du {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n} « Empêchez les mécréants de s'approcher de l'autel, ô technofrères, car il est écrit dans le sixième article du Grimoire de Sécurité : "Gardez la Connaissance hors de portée des ignorants"... Les esprits enténébrés sont indignes de mon sermon. »
languages.original_text: {n}A rustle comes from the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n} "Drive the unworthy away from the altar, tech-brethren, for it is said in the Sixth Article of Security, 'Let Knowledge be locked away from the ignorant.' The words of my sermon must not reach dark minds."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un bruissement sort du {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n} « Empêchez les mécréants de s'approcher de l'autel, ô technofrères, car il est écrit dans le sixième article du Grimoire de Sécurité : "Gardez la Connaissance hors de portée des ignorants"... Les esprits enténébrés sont indignes de mon sermon. »

languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵装置{/g}中发出沙沙声。{/n}“快快将卑劣之人赶出圣坛，技术同胞，安全守则第六条规定，‘知识必须封存，无知者不得染指。’，我的布道绝不能被愚昧的头脑听取。”
languages.original_text: {n}A rustle comes from the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n} "Drive the unworthy away from the altar, tech-brethren, for it is said in the Sixth Article of Security, 'Let Knowledge be locked away from the ignorant.' The words of my sermon must not reach dark minds."

traits.locale_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵装置{/g}中发出沙沙声。{/n}“快快将卑劣之人赶出圣坛，技术同胞，安全守则第六条规定，‘知识必须封存，无知者不得染指。’，我的布道绝不能被愚昧的头脑听取。”

languages.text: {n}カサカサとした音が{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}から聞こえてくる。{/n}「取るに足りぬ者はこの祭壇から去れ、技術同胞よ。安全の第六節に曰く、『知識は無知より隠せ』。俺からの説教としてこの言葉を贈るが、暗き知性には届くまい」
languages.original_text: {n}A rustle comes from the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n} "Drive the unworthy away from the altar, tech-brethren, for it is said in the Sixth Article of Security, 'Let Knowledge be locked away from the ignorant.' The words of my sermon must not reach dark minds."

traits.locale_text: {n}カサカサとした音が{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}から聞こえてくる。{/n}「取るに足りぬ者はこの祭壇から去れ、技術同胞よ。安全の第六節に曰く、『知識を無知より隠せ』。俺からの説教としてこの言葉を贈るが、暗き知性には届くまい」

languages.text: {n}Un susurro proviene del {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g}.{/n} «Alejad a los indignos del altar, tecnosacerdotes, pues se dice en el Sexto Artículo de Seguridad: "Que el Conocimiento sea encerrado lejos de los ignorantes". Las palabras de mi sermón no deben llegar a las mentes oscuras».
languages.original_text: {n}A rustle comes from the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n} "Drive the unworthy away from the altar, tech-brethren, for it is said in the Sixth Article of Security, 'Let Knowledge be locked away from the ignorant.' The words of my sermon must not reach dark minds."

Las palabras de mi sermón no deben llegar a las mentes oscuras».

languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vokstan{/g} bir hışırtı geliyor.{/n} "Altıncı Emniyet Bendi, 'İrfanı cahillerden uzak tut.' der. Bundandır ki alçakları sunaktan uzaklaştırın tekno kardeşlerim. Vaazımın tek bir kelimesi bile karanlık zihinlere erişmemeli."
languages.original_text: {n}A rustle comes from the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n} "Drive the unworthy away from the altar, tech-brethren, for it is said in the Sixth Article of Security, 'Let Knowledge be locked away from the ignorant.' The words of my sermon must not reach dark minds."

traits.locale_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Voks{/g}tan bir hışırtı geliyor.{/n} "Altıncı Emniyet Bendi, 'İrfan'ı cahillerden uzak tut' der. Bundandır ki alçakları sunaktan uzaklaştırın tekno kardeşlerim. Vaazımın tek bir kelimesi bile karanlık zihinlere erişmemeli."
